entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: single_query, tls-handshakes-kestrel #61329
  • Perf improvement: json, kestrel-encoded-url, kestrel-encoded-url #61328
  • OpenAPI: Form data route with enum parameter with default value throws exception #61327
  • Blazor AddInteractiveServerComponents conflicts with Identity pages #61320
  • Warning AD0001 : Analyzer 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Analyzers.RouteHandlers.RouteHandlerAnalyzer' NullReferenceException due to dynamic in method signature #61319

Closed

  • OpenAPI: Nullable collection with validation attributes throws error #61330
  • Perf regression: antiforgery-generation, httpsys-header-symbols, json #61286
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #61315
  • Perf regression: fortunes, json_middleware, mTls-handshakes-httpsys #61299
  • Perf regression: httpsys-encoded-url, json, tls-handshakes-httpsys #61300
  • Perf regression: httpsys-encoded-url #61301
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware #61308
  • Build Failure with Error: "FilterStaticWebAssetEndpoints" task failed unexpectedly. #60517
    .NET 10 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Update maintenance-packages versions #61326
    area-infrastructure
  • Add support for setting security attributes on Http.Sys RequestQueue #61325
    feature-httpsys, area-networking
  • Update MicrosoftBuildVersion to 17.8.3 #61322
    area-infrastructure
  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-preview.4.25204.2 #61318
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Fix for Kestrel's ParseHeaders throwing ArgumentOutOfRange exception #61316
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Added System.Text.Json serialization-based JsonPatch implementation #61313
    area-mvc

Merged

  • [main] (deps): Update dotnet/arcade requirement to 0c0caeb605f7b2b99408bfa6b18b13526d747727 #61321
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview4
  • update community-triager list #61309
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview4

Updated

  • Use Copy Constructor for JsonSerializerSettings #61251
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Make default stack size to be 1 MB in base16 #60811
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Typo in AuthenticationMetrics.cs description #61312
    area-networking
  • Fix preserving messages for stateful reconnect with backplane #60900
    area-signalr, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add `NotFoundPage` to `Router` #60970
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-routing, .NET 10 Planning
  • `HttpNavigationManager` no longer uses `NavigationException` #61306
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-navigation, 10.0-preview4
  • feat: fetch TLS client hello message from HTTP.SYS #60806
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Add InvokeNew, GetValue & SetValue to JS interop API #61246
    area-blazor

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cosmos/Vector: move vector related model validation (e.g. index without property) to container creation #35903
    10.0.0
  • JOIN instead of CROSS APPLY with SelectMany-nested Select #35902
    Backlog
  • Bad SQL when you use aggregation by OwnsOne property #35901
  • Crash in left join against sub query #35900

Closed

  • Bad SQL for aggregating query after GroupBy #35899

PullRequests

Merged

  • Refactor property accessors #35857
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #35769

Updated

  • Cosmos Full Text Search support #35868

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android] Overriding back button functionality with OnBackButtonPressed returning false in a modally pushed page causes stack overflow #28811
  • Add Analyzer to warn about implement IDisposable on types registered into your services #28810
    Backlog
  • [Android] java.lang.IllegalStateException: Cannot transition entry that is not in the back stack #28809
  • Handling Views in Landscape & Portrait Mode #28808
  • [Testing] Reenable flaky UI test with Issue19509Test #28806
  • [Android] HybridWebView crash app #28801
  • Remove .NET 8 specific code from sample content template #28800
    .NET 9 SR7
  • Contol disappears when android:hardwareAccelerated="false" #28798

Closed

  • Light up .NET MAUI Item Templates for .NET MAUI Solution #6416
    Backlog
  • Bump CommunityToolkit/SF on IncludeSampleContent template #28324
    .NET 9 SR7
  • Deprecate platform-specifics that run on ListView #28757
    .NET 10.0-preview4
  • Reconcile all NET8 //TODO Add this API comments #8989
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Unable to use custom appicon always defaults to android appicon #27625
  • win: EmptyView of CollectionView can only locate on top of the view #19627
  • MAUI Blazor App WebView2 Fails Silently When Installed to C:\Program Files #28792
  • iOS Push notification icon keep using default .NET #28799
  • App crashes on android after about 1 hr usage with Fatal signal 6 (SIGABRT), code -1 (SI_QUEUE) in tid 6664 (SGen worker) #28558
  • System.InvalidOperationException: InvalidOperation_ConcurrentOperationsNotSupported #28648
  • ViewExtensions.CancelAnimations DOES NOT WORK verified windows android and iOS! #21964
  • tutorial application issue #27814
  • Custom BindableProperty on Triggers not working #21992
  • [Android] Setting the background property of Picker/Spinner in a handler mapping does not work for .net 8 #28317
  • To build this project, the following workloads must be installed: maui-android #28508
  • RealParent of StackLayout has been Garbage Collected #28608

PullRequests

Created

  • [Testing] Fix for flaky Issue19509Test in CI #28807
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed NullReferenceException when using x:Name with SolidColorBrush #28805
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fix for Transparent Background Color not applied to WebView #28804
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Resaved TabbedPage UI Test Images for Catalyst Due to Tab Bar Background Color Variations #28803
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Revert "Fix HideSoftInputOnTapped Not Working Net9 " #28802
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion, test-flight
  • Android TimePicker ignores 24 hour system setting when using Format Property - fix #28797
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker

Merged

  • Update CommunityToolkit.Maui reference in sample content template #28510
    p/0, area-templates, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests in CI that occasionally fail - 6 #28747
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr4] [iOS] CollectionView footer sizing when source is empty - fix #28794
    .NET 9 SR4.2
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr5] [iOS] CollectionView footer sizing when source is empty - fix #28793

Updated

  • [Windows] Upgrade to Windows App SDK 1.7 #28499
    platform/windows 🪟, area-infrastructure, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • Cleanup virtual layer measure invalidation #28756
    area-layout, community ✨
  • Stop iOS SetNeedsLayout propagation by looking at VisualElement computed Constraint #28479
    area-layout, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Fixed Test case failure in PR 28486 #28780
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion, test-flight
  • [iOS]Fix: FlyoutPage memory leak #28769
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, memory-leak 💦, .NET 9 SR7
  • [MacOS] Fixed NullReferenceException when using ImagePaint #28726
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] - Fix Visual State Issue with Picker TextColor After Navigation #28746
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-picker, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fixed the CollectionView Header and Footer Do Not Align with Horizontal ItemsLayout When EmptyView is Displayed" #28779
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Replaced MeasureInvalidated with IPlatformMeasureInvalidationController for Shell Flyout's Footer #28775
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell
  • [iOS ]Fix for issue -> Disconnecting Map Handler causes Map to crash on second page entrance and moving to region #28795
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-map
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28203
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "Convert to top-level statements" does not correctly handle code excluded by conditional preprocessor directive #78002
  • Make netfx build task publishing more robust #78001
    Next

Closed

  • Unexpected namespace colorization in implemented interface #78004
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-36003.39 #77997
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-36003.130 #77996

PullRequests

Created

  • Simplify workspace initialization in the LSP server #78010
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Improve detection of code whose updates may not have effect #78009
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode
  • Be resilient to (and report) exceptions we encounter when calling into 3rd party extensions in a gladstone context. #78007
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update maintenance-packages versions #78005
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update PublishData.json after VS snap to rel/d17.14 #78003
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use dev17.14 for localization #78000
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bind compound assignment operator declarations #77999
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Feature-UserDefinedCompoundAssignmentOperators

Merged

  • Change SolutionState.ProjectStates from an ImmutableDictionary<ProjectId, ProjectState> to an ImmutableArray<ProjectState> #77971
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Merge 17.15 into main #78006
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce main thread switches in VisualStudioProjectFactory.CreateAndAddToWorkspaceAsync (#77920) #77998
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Revert "Another attempt to move MiscellaneousFilesWorkspace to a bg thread" #77983
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce main thread switches in VisualStudioProjectFactory.CreateAndAddToWorkspaceAsync #77920
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Updated

  • Add LSP handler for custom requests #77444
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Fix EA layering for Razor.ExternalAccess #77927
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix crash in backing field nullability cycle scenario #77993
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Execute core compiler from full framework msbuild #77914
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP Merge EditorFeatures.WPF into EditorFeatures #77707
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Update ignored directives public API #77968
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Feature - Ignored Directives
  • Make partial interface members virtual #77379
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, breaking-change
  • Extensions: ref safety analysis #77967
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Expression trees: optional arguments #77972
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NativeAOT failure in System.Reflection.Tests.GetTypeTests.GetType_InvalidAssemblyName #114288
  • SIGKILL System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Tests #114287
  • SVE: Reuse ptrue value instead of rematerializing it everytime #114286
    10.0.0
  • RuntimePropertyInfo performance regression when used in a hash table #114280
  • Re-enable Azure Linux 3 testing #114276
  • Assertion failed '!stmt->IsPhiDefnStmt()' during 'Assertion prop' #114275
  • Suboptimal stack zeroing on AVX512 #114274
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Rx-like operators for IAsyncEnumerable<T> #114269
  • [API Proposal]: Add support for nested data streaming in `JsonSerializer.DeserializeAsyncEnumerable`. #114265
    Future
  • Counterintuitive behaviour of linked CancellationTokenSource #114264
  • [net9] System.Private.CoreLib occurs InvalidOperationException and InvalidCastException #114262
  • openssl error `digest not allowed` on RSA PSS signature in fips mode #114260
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Allow ObsoleteAttribute to target assemblies to enable marking entire assembly as obsolete #114259
  • PrincipalContext.ValidateCredentials is unable to validate credentials using Kerberos authentication. #114251
  • [wasm]regression in _HwiSideEffects::HwiSideEffects.TestProblemWithThrowingLoads #114250
    10.0.0

Closed

  • osx-x64 Release AllSubsets_Mono_Minijit_RuntimeTests minijit build leg fails to build with an error referencing a macosx12.0 #114248
  • CI flakiness: Mac builds failing with SDK errors #114235
  • Test failure: _Sve_ro::JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.Arm._Sve.Program.Sve_GatherVector_Bases_double_ulong() #112264
    10.0.0
  • System.Net.Requests test timeout #113883
  • System.Net.Security.Tests timeout #114152
  • System.Net.WebSockets.Client.Tests timeout #114153
  • System.Net.Security.Unit.Tests timeout #114176
  • Move arithmetic DivideByZero and Overflow exceptions to JIT on 32-bit platforms #110226
    10.0.0
  • Stack overflow from static constructors taking locks on Native AOT #113949
    10.0.0
  • `Assembly.GetType(string, bool, bool)` throws unexpected `FileLoadException` on NET9 #113534
    10.0.0
  • Strange issues when mixing [UnmanagedCallersOnly] with [DLLImport] - "Method's type signature is not PInvoke compatible" emitted for incorrect methods #92409
    Future
  • Crashes during debugging when pausing in VS2022/.NET9 #110552
    10.0.0
  • Help Needed: Error NU1101 While Building Custom ODBC Wrapper #114220
  • iOS/Catalyst build performance regression from net8.0 to net9.0 #110406
    10.0.0
  • System.IO.Packaging - net8 - Package.Flush not flushing all data #114114
  • ClassUnloadStarted callback of ICorProfilerCallback is not called for generic class instances in different LoaderAllocator #114068
    10.0.0
  • [9.0][wasm] Failure in Wasm.Build.Templates.Tests.NativeBuildTests.ProjectWithDllImportsRequiringMarshalIlGen_ArrayTypeParameter #112218
    9.0.x
  • Crash when NullReferenceException occurs in background thread on x64 #107026
    10.0.0
  • [Test Failure] SslStreamDisposeTest.Dispose_ParallelWithHandshake_ThrowsODE on Unix #113833
    10.0.0
  • Interlocked.CompareExchange<UInt128> Does Not Work on ARM64 (Mac M1) #114247
  • JIT: Wrong result with `ConditionalExtractAfterLastActiveElement` #113939
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix failure in System.Reflection.Tests.GetTypeTests.GetType_InvalidAssemblyName #114289
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add bootstrapping build mechanism and enable for SourceBuild #114285
    source-build, area-Infrastructure
  • SVE: Slightly better calculation of stack frame for ldr/str #114284
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove unused and unnecessary `CLRConfig`s. #114282
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Update maintenance-packages versions #114281
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix build break with cmake 4.0 #114278
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0-staging] Moved a static field initialization from Thread to ProcessorIdCache #114273
    area-System.Threading
  • Remove CreateFalse node during lowering, if MaskToVector is getting removed #114272
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][interp] Use packedsimd for vector operators too #114271
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, os-browser
  • [clr-interp] Fix emit of bb end var moves #114267
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • fix: in rsa signatures, configure digest before padding mode #114261
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [browser] msbuild leaks tesing #114258
    area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Use `Stream.ReadAtLeast` when loading ZipArchives #114256
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Name native threads before start on macOS #114249
    area-System.Threading

Merged

  • GetType: keep throwing same exceptions as .NET 8 #114228
    area-System.Reflection
  • ML-KEM: PKCS#8 Exports #114266
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix build break with cmake 4.0 #114279
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix build break with cmake 4.0 #114277
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Alternate approach for HELPER_METHOD_FRAME removal for arithmetic div… #113286
    area-VM-coreclr
  • adding runtime-outerloop to build-analysis. #114164
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: Optimize ConditionalSelect with const zero when condition is not TYP_MASK #113864
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • SVE: Fix the mask values returned by Helper #114255
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Switch libraries testing to Ubuntu 22 temporarily #114268
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][interp] Group all the System.Runtime.Intrinsics logic together #114270
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Remove jitstress-isas-sve pipeline #114245
    needs-area-label
  • Moved a static field initialization from Thread to ProcessorIdCache #114227
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] profilers linking and instrumentation in AOT #114080
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [debugger] Fix crash during Async Break when APC and CET are enabled #111408
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Make COR_PRF_DISABLE_OPTIMIZATIONS Allowable After Attach and non immutable #113924
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [HttpStress] Track unobserved exceptions #114225
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/9.0-staging] Revert disabling of tests for HTTP servers #114207
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/8.0] Revert disabling of tests for HTTP servers #114209
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http
  • [mono] Tweaks to bridge testing #114203
    area-GC-mono
  • Fix SslStreamDisposeTest for parallel handshake on Unix #114100
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [WASI] fix trimming #114211
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, linkable-framework, os-wasi
  • [wasm] Flag Vector128.Load regression as active issue for the moment #114253
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix the encoding for sve_mov #114244
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Create error message when `UnmanagedCallersOnly` is used with `DllImport`. #114240
    area-Interop-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Add support for building runtime with FEATURE_EH_FUNCLETS on win-x86 #114157
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ML-KEM: ImportFrom{Encrypted}Pem #114155
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • [wasm][interp] Add aliases for Vector128.Load and Vector128.LoadUnsafe #114243
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono

Updated

  • [RuntimeAsync] Move runtime async to the main repo #113976
    NO-MERGE, new-api-needs-documentation, runtime-coreclr, runtime-async
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2679685 #114238
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Move funclets invocation to code managers #114180
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [DRAFT] Split up loader heap implementations #114246
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Arm-64:[PAC][WIP]Add auth-strip in prolog and epilog of jitted methods #110472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Allow TargetOS and TargetRid to be overridden in DotNetBuild.props #113765
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix "MMM.yy" date parsing in German culture. #114169 #114194
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Send host tests to helix #114187
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • JIT: Add post-morph profile repair phase #113896
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Introduce Zbb #114150
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Removing unnecessary comments #114190
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, 10.0.0
  • [cDAC] Adds DAC like entrypoint with new COM interface #113899
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Simplifying the loop generated in genZeroInitFrameUsingBlockInit and jump encoding #114003
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add Decimal32, Decimal64, Decimal128 #100729
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [browser] event pipe - JavaScript part #110818
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • HTTP/3: Eliminate near-zero "wait for connection" telemetry signals #114083
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Utilize `sh(x)add(.uw)` instructions #113999
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

    area-EnC-mono
  • Add FrozenDictionary.Create #114192
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0

    area-VM-coreclr, area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr

    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [TEST][CI] Azure Linux 3 experiments #114145
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, needs-area-label
  • Fix discrepancy between HttpRequest/ResponseMessage.ToString and HttpHeaders.ToString #114101
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [S.N.Quic] Observe exceptions in ResettableValueTaskSource #114226
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [WinHTTP] Certificate caching on WinHttpHandler to eliminate extra call to Custom Certificate Validation #111791

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException: Token 2007ffe is not valid in the scope of module System.ModuleHandle. #48182
  • Support for sdk directive #48179
    10.0.1xx
  • Support for property directive #48178
    10.0.1xx
  • Support for package directive #48177
    10.0.1xx
  • Single file editing experience spike #48176
    10.0.1xx
  • dotnet run app.cs tooling experience #48175
    10.0.1xx
  • Support multiple files in `dotnet run` #48174
    10.0.1xx
  • Keep working directory clean in `dotnet run file.cs` #48172
    10.0.1xx
  • dotnet run app.cs cli experience #48170
    10.0.1xx
  • Revise `dotnet test` logic for MTP for splitting TargetFrameworks #48158

Closed

  • error MSB4014: Microsoft.Build.BackEnd.SdkResolution.SdkResolverException: The SDK resolver "Microsoft.DotNet.MSBuildWorkloadSdkResolver" failed while attempting to re solve the SDK "Microsoft.NET.Sdk". Exception: "Microsoft.NET.Sdk.WorkloadManifestReader.WorkloadManifestCompositionException: .... #36392
    8.0.4xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Update README.md #48187

    untriaged, Area-run-file
  • Fix incorrect index in MSTest template #48168
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Allow additional package types with PackAsTool #48039
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update package-table.md #48186
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Hide stack on WorkloadResolver constructor error #38091
    Area-SdkResolvers
  • Auto enable retry when detected #48142
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAsset] Fix label not being correctly updated and add a unit test #48171
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Do not use live shims for tools packages in VMR #48153
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Disable synchronization of sourcelink to the VMR #48166
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve MTP dotnet test exit code messages #47979
